trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Traverse City
There were no other sightings in Traverse City on or around June 18th 2013
Summary: white cigar hovered, then moved slowly away
divs: sighting detailswatched a thin white cigar-shaped ufo at lunchtime hover high over west bay, then move very slowly north\northwest against prevailing winds (which were from the north) until it faded from view. my sunglasses helped cut through the haze so that i had a clear view of it. i got the feeling it was a saucer shape seen from the side, based on its path away from me. i observed it for about 10 minutes from parking lot of mcdonald's. obviously not a plane, helicopter, sail, or balloon.
